docs.snippet: Paraguay is a fruitful land for development and foreign investment, according to one of its leading economists, Dr. Hermogenes Gonzalez-Maya.

docs.snippet: The Belle of Louisville, a stern-wheeler built in 1914, is a piece of vintage Americana that evokes images of a quieter era.  Recently, however, the old river steamer has created a small squall in the ultramodern world of international trade.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Belle of Louisville, a stern-wheeler built in 1914, is a piece of vintage Americana that evokes images of a quieter era. Recently, however, the old river steamer has created a small squall in the ultramodern world of international trade.
docs.abstract: Japan negotiates to buy old river steamer Louisville Belle to use as floating exhibit on Western Waterways System, US; illus; Amer groups spur growing trend in floating trade fairs; some plans detailed

headline.main: Trade Promotions Are Taking to the Sea in Ships; Exhibition Vessels a Growing Trend U.S. Groups Battle Japanese Plan TRADE PROMOTION TAKES TO THE SEA

docs.snippet: Leo D. Welch, who has spent much of his executive lifetime in foreign lands, is beginning a fresh globe-girdling career at the age of 65.  His new job--board chairman and chief executive officer of the Communications Satellite Corporation--is quite...
docs.lead_paragraph: Leo D. Welch, who has spent much of his executive lifetime in foreign lands, is beginning a fresh globe-girdling career at the age of 65. His new job--board chairman and chief executive officer of the Communications Satellite Corporation--is quite without parallel either in industry or government.
docs.abstract: Article on chmn Welch and pres Charyk

headline.main: Chairman of Comsat Is Facing Challenges on Land and in Air; Left Jersey Standard Related Problems Chairman of Comsat Is Facing Challenges on Land and in Air
